resources.string: Tap the icon again to directly start typing a search term.
This will delete all of your browsing history, and close any currently open tabs. Are you sure?
By publishing, you agree to the Terms of Use, and to irrevocably release your contributions under the CC BY-SA 3.0 license.

By publishing, you agree to the Terms of Use, and to irrevocably release your contributions under the CC BY-SA 3.0 license. Edits will be attributed to the IP address of your device. If you log in, you will have more privacy.
This page is not available in other languages.
Your changes have not been published yet. Are you sure you want to leave this page?
No results found in reading lists
To help protect against automated spam, please enter the words that appear below
Can\'t see the image? Request an account
Two-factor authentication required! Please return to the main activity and log in with your 2FA token, then retry.
You logged in with a temporary password. To finish logging in, please set your new password here.
This will log you out on all devices where you are currently logged in. Do you want to continue?
You have been logged out of Wikipedia. Would you like to log in again?
Track what you\'ve been reading here.
Some articles in history may not be viewable while offline.
Search and read the free encyclopedia in your language
The password must be at least 8 characters
Create account with no email address?
Although the email address is optional, it is highly recommended, since an email is needed for account recovery if you ever lose your password.
Recommended since email is needed for account recovery.
The user name \"%s\" is not available. Please choose a different name.
Sorry, your IP address is currently blocked from creating new accounts.
Sync reading lists across different devices by saving them to your Wikipedia account
Sync reading lists across different devices by saving them to your Wikipedia account \"%s\"
This will completely delete all previously synced reading lists from remote storage. Remove all synced lists from your account \"%s\"?
Allow Wikimedia to collect information about how you use the app to make the app better
Allow the app to send crash reports to a third-party service provider automatically so that we can review your crash and fix the bug faster and more easily.
Links to blocked domains (%s) detected. Please remove them and try again.
This page has been fully protected.
This page has been protected to the following levels: %s
Sorry, your account does not have sufficient privileges to edit this page at this time.
Sorry, this page cannot be edited anonymously at this time.
Keep track of what\'s happening to articles you are interested in. Tap the overflow menu and select Add to Watchlist to see changes to an article.
This app was translated by the volunteer translators at translatewiki.net.
Source code available on Gerrit and GitHub under the Apache 2.0 License. Unless otherwise specified, content is available under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike License.
The page has been modified. Are you sure you want to exit without saving your changes?
Your user account has been blocked from editing on this wiki.
Your IP address has been blocked from editing.
How did you improve the page?
Other ways you improved the page
The page has already been modified by a different user, and is conflicting with your edit. Please copy your edits, go back and refresh the page, then try editing again.
The article has been opened in a background tab.
This may be an unconstructive edit. Are you sure you want to publish it?
You cannot publish this edit. Please go back and change it.

An automated filter has identified this edit as potentially unconstructive. It may contain one or more of the following:

· Typing in all caps
· Blanking articles or spamming
· Irrelevant external links or images
· Repeating characters

An automated filter has identified this edit as potentially unconstructive, or potential vandalism.

Wikipedia is an encyclopedia and only neutral, notable content belongs here.
Are you sure you want to clear your search history?
Could not open web page (no browser app found).
Enable or disable loading of images in pages. Uncheck this setting if your Internet connection is slow, or if your data plan is limited.
You have "Download only over Wi-Fi" turned on in settings. Do you want to allow using your mobile data plan for this download only?
Permission to write to storage on your device is required for saving images.
Are you sure you want to close all tabs?
Tap on the bookmark icon to save the article to a reading list.
You can now swipe left to open the table of contents, and also tap and drag on this scroller button to quickly jump to different sections of an article.

You can now search and read in multiple Wikipedia languages in the app.


Tap on the icon to add more languages.
Response from the server was not formatted correctly.
This title relates to more than one page:
Article cannot be loaded while offline.
Hint: Add the article to a reading list and it will be downloaded once you\'re back online.
You are reading an offline version of this article saved on %s.
Could not find any apps that provide directions.
Show a quick preview of articles when tapping on links.
Automatically collapse tables in articles, such as infoboxes, references, and notes.
Sorry, voice recognition is not available.
Enable location permissions to see places near you.
The Android System WebView is currently being updated. Please try again in a moment.
Cannot connect to Wikipedia. Check your network connection, or try again later
Save data usage by loading articles that are available offline rather than always loading the latest version of an article
Content is available under $1 unless otherwise noted
Your username or IP address has been blocked.
The block was made by %1$s
You can contact %1$s or another administrator to discuss the block.
You can contact an administrator to discuss the block.
We\'re sorry, the Wikipedia app has experienced an error and was terminated.\n\nWould you like to start over or quit?
Drag the slider to change the size of the text that is used when reading articles. To set the text size throughout the rest of the app, change your system text size.
Switch to using the app\'s dark color theme
Saved %s. Do you want to add it to a list?
All good! %s already contains all articles.
Add articles to a list for reading later, even when you\'re offline.
You have no articles added to this list.
Move from %s to another reading list
%s will no longer be available offline for all reading lists:
Articles saved to reading lists can now be synced to your Wikipedia account. Learn more
Reading lists can now be synced across devices. Log in to your Wikipedia account and allow your lists to be saved. Learn more
Reading lists can now be synced across devices. Log in to your Wikipedia account and allow your lists to be saved.
The article is being downloaded, and it will be available offline when complete.
Are you sure you want to delete %s?
Log in to allow your reading lists to be saved to your account.
Reading list sync is off for your account, and saved articles on your logged-in devices are no longer being backed up. Turn on reading list sync in Settings.
Articles saved to reading lists can now be synced to your Wikipedia account. Learn more
Default list for your saved articles
Create lists for places to travel to, favorite topics, and much more
There is a limit of %d articles per reading list. Existing lists with more than this limit have been split into multiple lists.
Can\'t move to this list. You\'ve reached the limit of %2$d articles per list for \"%1$s\".
Can\'t add to this list. You\'ve reached the limit of %2$d articles per list for \"%1$s\".
Can\'t create another list. You\'ve reached the limit of 100 reading lists per account.

plurals.name: reading_list_article_offline_message
plurals.item: This article will now be available offline.
These articles will now be available offline.

plurals.name: reading_list_article_not_offline_message
plurals.item: This article will no longer be available offline.
These articles will no longer be available offline.

resources.string: You\'re all caught up on notifications!
Allow the app to use data to check for new notifications in the background.
Someone thanks you for an edit
One of your contributions was reverted
Someone mentions you in a page
Messages and replies from talk pages
Someone sent you an email through the wiki
Received when your user rights change
Received when a new link is made to a page you created
Content cannot be loaded when offline.
Note that not all card types are available in all Wikipedia languages. Edit your selected languages in Settings.
Events in history on this day
Suggestions based on a recently read article from your history
Daily featured image from Wikimedia Commons
Main page of Wikipedia with daily featured content
Suggestions to add content to Wikipedia
There\'s nothing on your Explore feed

Customize your Explore feed

You can now choose what to show on your feed, and also prioritize your favorite types of content.
You have reached the bottom of the feed.
Thanks for your continued interest in editing article descriptions! To make additional edits, please log in to your Wikipedia account.
By changing the article description, I agree to the Terms of Use and to irrevocably release my contributions under the Creative Commons CC0 license.
usually begin with a lowercase letter
The text must not end with punctuation.
Avoid starting with articles like “a” or “the”.
Start with a lowercase letter unless the first word is a proper noun.
Avoid starting with a lowercase letter.
The text appears to be in an unexpected language. The language should be %s.
Enjoyed that? Help us add more.
You just made Wikipedia better for everyone
You can also edit articles within this app. Try fixing typos and small sentences by clicking on the ^1 icon next time
Summarizes an article to help readers understand the subject at a glance
Ideally one line, between two to twelve words
By starting, I promise not to misuse this feature.
This file does not have a description
By adding the description, I agree to the Terms of Use and to irrevocably release my contributions under the Creative Commons CC0 license.
By adding the image caption, I agree to the Terms of Use and to irrevocably release my contributions under the Creative Commons CC0 license.
Add missing short captions to images
Translation tasks are available if you read and write in more than one Wikipedia language.
Locked until you’ve edited %d image captions
Locked until you’ve edited %d article descriptions (verified)
How was your editing experience? Please take a moment to fill out the survey about in-app editing.
Tagging images makes them easier to find.
By adding image tags, you will help make images easier to search for on Commons, the free license image repository that Wikipedia uses for images in its articles.
Only tags that you choose will be added to images.
Add custom tags to an image to make it easier to find.
You haven\'t selected any tags for this image
Only tags that you choose will be added to images. Tags that are not selected will be marked as rejected. Are you sure you want to mark all tags as rejected?
%s\, thanks for your edits. Below you can find more ways to contribute to Wikipedia.
Hi %s\, below you can find some quick and easy ways to help improve Wikipedia. You\'ll see the difference you\'re making as soon as you get started. Happy editing!
Describe an image to help readers understand its meaning and context.
Summarize an article to help readers understand the subject at a glance.
Your total number of contributions so far.
How many days in a row that you have made contributions. If you haven\'t contributed in a while, it shows your last contribution date.
Total pageviews of items to which you have contributed in the last 30 days.
Based on how many times one of your contributions was reverted (undone by another editor). Reverted edits: %d.
Suggested edits is paused until %1$s. Sorry %2$s, some of your recent contributions have been reverted.
Suggested edits is disabled. Sorry %s, too many of your recent contributions have been reverted.
It looks like your IP address (or range of IP addresses) is currently blocked from editing Wikipedia.
Suggested edits presents opportunities for small but vital contributions to Wikipedia.
By publishing, you agree to the terms of use and to irrevocably release this contribution under the CC0 license.
Thanks for editing Wikipedia! Why not continue where you left off?
Have a minute to continue improving Wikipedia? Check out these editing suggestions.

plurals.name: suggested_edits_contribution_seen_times
plurals.item: Seen once in the past 30 days.
Seen %s times in the past 30 days.

resources.string: Seen %s times in the past 30 days.
Did you know that everyone can edit Wikipedia?

Suggested edits is a new way to edit Wikipedia on Android. It helps you make small but vital contributions to Wikipedia.\nOur goal is to make editing easier and more accessible for everyone! Log in or join Wikipedia to get started.
Your edit is currently live on Wikipedia
We know you tried your best, but one of the reviewers had a concern. Possible reasons your edit was reverted include:
your contribution didn\'t follow one of the guidelines.
your contribution looked like an experiment or vandalism.
If you are interested, see the edit history.
Permission to access storage on your device is required for offline browsing.
Permission to access storage on your device is required to use the Offline Library.

Dive down the Wikipedia rabbit hole with a constantly updating Explore feed.
Customize the feed to your interests – whether it’s learning about historical events On this day, or rolling the dice with Random.

You can make reading lists from articles you want to read later, even when you’re offline.
Login to your Wikipedia account to sync your reading lists. Join Wikipedia
Help make the app better by letting us know how you use it. Data collected is anonymous. Learn more
We’ve found the following on your device:
You will only see content on the Explore feed and quick search filters for remaining Wikipedia languages.
Keep at least one Wikipedia language from which to search and read content.
Remove a Chinese variant from your app languages?
You currently have both Traditional and Simplified Chinese variants set in your app languages. Update your app languages settings?
Hi %s, did you know that everyone can edit Wikipedia?
Did you know that everyone can edit Wikipedia?
Find articles and pages you previously added to your watchlist in the More menu under Watchlist.
\'Thanks\' are an easy way to show appreciation for an editor\’s work on Wikipedia. \'Thanks\' cannot be undone and are publicly viewable
%1$s and its talk page have been added to your watchlist %2$s.
%s and its talk page have been removed from your watchlist.
You do not have any articles in your watchlist.
